website_summaries.verdict: With a classic design and stunning details, this option is ideal for anyone looking to add a touch of elegance to their bedroom.
pros: We love the beautiful details, from the turned legs to the nailhead trim
Tufted cushioning is plush and comfortable
Legs have casters for effortless portability
Extra length works well for king sized beds
cons: Doesn’t work with every decor style

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and really beautiful!  Perfect for the end of my king sized bed.
customer_reviews.text: I received this bench yesterday, and upon opening the box I was immediately impressed with how elegant and beautiful it is! It's even more beautiful than in the photo. It was super easy to assemble and once assembled, it was very sturdy. I liked it so much that I almost wish I had more places to put a bench like this. I am attaching a couple of photos to show the color we received since other people are commenting on it. Although the color isn't white as it appears in the product photo, it is a pretty shade of light tan linen.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla - stay-at-home mom of 3 boys

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice bench with or without the casters
customer_reviews.text: The casters are removable with a Phillips driver. There are three screws that attach each caster to the wooden leg. You'll lose ~1.5" of height. We use our bench in our carpeted bedroom and didn't want the casters digging into the carpet, possibly developing holes and tears due to the tiny surface area of contact that each metal caster makes with the ground. Without the casters, there is much more surface area to spread out the weight.
customer_reviews.author: abhorrent

customer_reviews.title: Love this bench!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench! It's on wayfair.com for $279 and I couldn't believe the price I paid on Amazon. It works great with the length of my king bed too. The reason I gave it 4 stars is because a button popped off the cushion, easy fix though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the best buys. The price does not compare. I purchased for the length and style but I did not expect the quality. It sit at the edge of my cal king bed and it complicate it. My previous bench was dwarfed by my bed. I am very pleased. High recommendation. Shopping online is always a dice game but I won this round.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Long enough for a Kingbed
customer_reviews.text: I have king size bed , so finding a bench long enough without spending a couple of hundreds is slim to none! The fabric is more of creamy white linen material, with nail head detail & button head cushion & legs with roller wheels!! Most importantly the length is 61inchs , I did look at other vendors that carried a similar bench however they were 51inchs or smaller all for the same amount or more.. So ,yes I went big & I am happy!! So if you have a kingbed & looking for a nice looking affordable bench you can't go wrong!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Dusty Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Love it! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have a modern low-profile bed. I have a 14" mattress with a 6" box platform and 3" off the floor. The bench is 18". I immediately wanted to remove the wheel casters it it's not so bad. It would take another 3" off so I left them. Just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ShellyK

customer_reviews.title: This bench is wonderful , very elegant and well built
customer_reviews.text: this bench is wonderful , very elegant and well built in spite of that I had to return it because color is more creamy-yellow and not white as it look on picture I really really wanted to keep it in my living room but color will not work for me ,The fabric is a sort of linen cloth .... if the color work for you , you should buy this bench with confidence as always the return process was a breeze Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: This is ABSOLUTELY NOT WHITE!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a true white color, this is NOT for you. It is a beige color, actually darker than it looks... I am stuck with it now, since it's too much of a hassle to return this giant bench. It is sturdy and was super easy to assemble. But I am VERY DISAPPOINTED with them saying it's white. Totally messed up the whole look of my master bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Poe

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bench. I have animals, 3 dogs and a cat, so I sprayed it with 2 coats of Scotchgard. Assembly was ridiculously easy, my 14 year old daughter did it. Legs are located in a zippered section under the bench. It is large, pictured under a 65 inch tv. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: nic_nic

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! LOVE! LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful beach! I’ve look for a long time to find a bench to go at the end of my bed. Neutral and beautiful! Very classy look. I was going to order a $1500+bench from RH and this bench smokes theirs. Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bench, top quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, looks great! I am so pleased with bench, it looks beautiful in the bedroom. The padding is think and luxurious. I would have been even happier if the casters could be removed.... I'm not crazy about the casters on my wood floor, and I think the legs would be nicer looking without them. But overall, I'm a satisfied customer. The product was packaged very carefully, and it look just a few minutes to assemble. Excellent value
customer_reviews.author: Cook-E

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench!
customer_reviews.text: I found this on Amazon and knew immediately that it was a great price and it's exactly my style, so I snagged it up. It looks great against the end of my bed. I do not have a foot board, so it is really attractive and makes the bed and room more glorious. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie R. Morin

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars because of the price and length
customer_reviews.text: I got this to place under a window to fill some space. I can't believe how much less it is on Amazon vs other very popular furniture sites. I had a REALLY hard time finding a bench long enough for the space and was thrilled when this one popped up. I love the textured linen and nailheads. Make sure you measure prior to ordering to ensure proper fit in your home.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love the bench!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, Love this bench. It is a very classy and adds to the look of the room. It is well made and easy to put the legs on once delivered. It is an off white linen color as I was expecting. The picture looks white right now, but it is definitely off white. It is a sturdy bench that goes almost the width of my king size bed, but I am glad it doesn't go all the way so you have walking room. It is a comfortable height for sitting and putting shoes on, and I am short, so that is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: crazeemarchese

customer_reviews.title: BEST VALUE BUY IT NOW
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of furniture, excellent craftsmanship, fabric is gorgeous, very sturdy solid wood legs, the padding is very firm, makes the the tuffeting look very high end! If you are even thinking about it, order now at this price it's a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Michelee

customer_reviews.title: Right size for my king bed
customer_reviews.text: The bench is beautiful, well constructed yet light. Love the under compartment where is legs came in. Easy to assemble. Only bad thing is a six months only warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Tayane Becker

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how nice it is. I was a little worried, but it’s much nicer than you would expect! The fabric is gorgeous, the wood legs are gorgeous. Looks like it costs WAY more than it did!
customer_reviews.author: a reader in America

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous & Luxe With A Very Reasonable Price!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about finding this after searching at brick & mortar stores. The tufting, the nail heads, & the castors, all give the feel of an upscale piece of furniture! The best part however, is that the price is fantastic & far lower than others we saw in stores! We are very happy with this bench!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this bench it is very pretty and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bench it is very pretty and comfy, the reason for the 4 stars instead of 5 is that the weight capacity is not in the description... it feels very sturdy but directions mention 280 pounds for the max. weight capacity ...my husband is 6' 5" and weighs 220 pounds just by himself. The weight capacity should be clearly indicated in item description.
customer_reviews.author: Cathycat

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made as  well as versatile bench.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Wanted it to put "excess" pillows on at night. And it's turned out to be even more useful. My husband and I both use it when we put on or take off our shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Dear and Darling

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tufted bench for any room
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bench. It’s very beautiful and looks expensive for the money. It was very easy to assemble. All I had to do was twist the legs on that were Inside a cubby that was zipped up underneath the bench. It would look good at the foot of the bed or on a wall in any room. It’s nice and wide . Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: AJB2014

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and was easy to assemble. I ordered it in the gray and largest size which is perfect for the end of a king size bed. It is sturdy enough to sit on and moves easily on the casters when it needs to be shifted. It looks lovely and like it should have cost much more than it did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Bench
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived as described in the online ad, and arrived ahead of schedule. I bought the wider bench for the foot of my King bed. It is very sturdy, well built. Was very easy to put the legs on it. The storage compartment on the bottom of the bench is a very clever idea for shipping all the parts in. I'm very happy with this product and would highly recommend it. 45yo. male.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The bench was easy to assemble and fairly sturdy. I thought the bench was a good value for the price. The only problem is the bench arrived damaged and the company Linon, never responded to my email and I didn't want to return the one and get a new one, I just wanted to exchange the damaged one for a new one. It is a big item and to return is huge ordeal. So now the amazon return window is closed and I am stuck with the damaged bench with a hole in the material.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Agnich

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bench for end of king size bed
customer_reviews.text: This bench is a perfect match for our king size bed. It is a classic piece of furniture and can be rolled into the living room for additional seating if needed. Great buy for the cost. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Ostroski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This isn't white. It's cream/ivory colored. Glad it fits in or I would be upset about that. It really is beautiful though. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: lilyopatra

customer_reviews.title: Nice touch
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and beautiful. Details and cushion are done nicely. The wheels roll, the feet look detailed and expensive and compliment the bench perfectly. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ida B.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product, quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench! I was a bit worried about the color because I didn't want white, but some of the reviews on here assured it wasn't and I can add another confirmation of that. It is a beautiful natural linen color. Very quick delivery and very easy assembly - glad I didn't pay $95 to screw on six legs - haha. Fits perfectly at the end of my king size bed and provides a great place to put my comforter at night. Great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kbit

customer_reviews.title: Adequate Material
customer_reviews.text: Material quality was not what we expected, and was concerned on the longevity of the fabric from tearing. Returned the product without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: David Alldridge

customer_reviews.title: Soooooo beautiful and a well made bench
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this bench again after receiving the first one that I had bought a month ago. I just loved it so much, I had to buy another one. You won't be disappointed!! It's sooooo gorgeous and a very high end quality product. It looks very BEAUTIFUL and looks expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Sa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Wrong color description
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice bench. The description of the color was wrong. The one supposed to be White is actually beige.
customer_reviews.author: suzie

customer_reviews.title: Damaged item received
customer_reviews.text: Shipping issue so took longer than it should have. Arrived damaged. There is something rattling inside like it it broken. No longer have the box and would cost too much to ship back
customer_reviews.author: Keshia M.

customer_reviews.title: More of a Cream than a White
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly with our space! I was hunting for a white/ivory/cream bench with black accents. This bench is perfect. I would say that three people could sit next to each other, but I would caution on the weight limit with three. I will say that the color is more of a cream than a white or ivory. It definitely leans towards the tan side than the pure white.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton McCardle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bench!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and very easy to assemble. The nail trim is individual nails not a strip. The fabric color is as pictured. This is a very sturdy bench that works well with a king size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Znsblvn

customer_reviews.title: I love this bench
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench. It came quickly and is as beautiful as the picture. A lovely charcoal color and the legs came carefully packaged inside. The fabric seems sturdy and is a nice texture. Easy to assemble. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: SaraK.

customer_reviews.title: It’s good so far
customer_reviews.text: We use this as both a seat to tie our shoes and for our dogs to get into our bed
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value for money. Sturdy, well designed, and perfectly sized for foot of bed. The color is closer to ivory than white, which was perfect for our application.
customer_reviews.author: Shooter

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: The bench is really nice. Love the wood legs and material. It is more beige than expected I thought was more white but I had read someone else's review prior to making a purchase and it worked for me As well. price is unbeatable. Probably I would pay 300 to 400 dollars somewhere else for the similar one. I'm very happy with my purchase. Shipped and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mila DH

customer_reviews.title: This is a really good Bed bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good Bed bench, it looks very solid and well made. I checked several at local store. at this price. this one seems to be the best I can find . it matches my king size bed , very comfortable to sit on , my wife and I like it very much. by the way , the Amazon prime shipping was good also, I thought it could be delay due to the size of the package, but it arrived in time.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: So Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for benches at my dinning room table, and they are perfect! So much room, kid approved, comfortable, perfect height for the dinner table, and the color is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Perfect length for a queen bed. Gorgeous and sturdy. Add a perfect accent at end of bed
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana

customer_reviews.title: Bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench is stunning! It looks way more expensive than it is. Be aware it is more ivory than white, which is what I was hoping for. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: tsmeek2

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fit to my new room
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! Perfect match to my new headboard and is not too long or too wide ! Plus love the zipper part inside the bench . Perfect hiding spot for light items such as important documents.
customer_reviews.author: shaquania

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful! I was scared it was too long for the living room wall area but it was a perfect fit! Very easy to assemble I did it without my husbands help :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One leg could not be screwed in .. Otherwise nice.
customer_reviews.text: I love the bench .. Sadly it didn't come in black so I successfully dyed the fabric to match our headboard. One of the legs would not screw in after several attempts to screw it in I realize the leg receiver was bent, had to drill it out and epoxy the leg in. Starting to hate online buying .. Seems there is always something.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench ... I just got it and it looks great in our room... it’s long enough for our bed... a bit hard... but a great look ...
customer_reviews.author: Aretha Blue

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE it. I was worried about the color based on others review of it - but it came exactly as I wanted. It’s a perfect piece to place at the foot of a King size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Cotten

customer_reviews.title: It is a cream color but a really nice bench for the price
customer_reviews.text: The color description is way off! This is definitely NOT white. See photo. It is a cream color but a really nice bench for the price.
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Piece
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece however the color is not white. It appears as a light creme color. It is also linen which was not stated in the descriptions and is a little firm. The package arrived on time and the product was very easy to assemble. Overall, it is a nice addition for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful and it was very easy to assemble took five minutes! Looks great in our bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Spork

customer_reviews.title: Good for the foot of a king size bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed bench is a gorgeous addition at the end of our bed. The original one we ordered was missing a button, but amazon accepted the return and sent a replacement. The replacement was in great shape and the bench is an excellent value for the money. It’s large and sturdy and just the right size for the foot of a king size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: My best new find!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this bench! It arrived in perfect condition and was easy to assemble without tools. It is an elegant looking bench at the end of my king sized bed. Other online sites sell the same bench for as much as $30 more.
customer_reviews.author: Montessahall

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The Lining underneath, where the legs are, was torn away from both sides and torn in the middle on both sides. After some consideration we decide to keep it. We stapled it back together as best we could. I’m still considering replacing tha lining. Shouldn’t have to deal with this kind of problem with a brand new bench.
customer_reviews.author: SassyCat

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Really inexpensive bench when compared to others at nice furniture stores. Honestly, I don't see any difference to ones that i looked at in stores that were $300 and up. The bench is packed extremely well and could not be any easier to put together (just screw on legs). Absolutely love it. You won't be sorry. Great Purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa M.

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect, but NOT WHITE. They sell little rubber things for wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Warning: cats love it and the color is a natural color. If you want white, you will be disappointed. See the picture against our antique white bed.
customer_reviews.author: D4

customer_reviews.title: and looks amazing at such a low price
customer_reviews.text: Have received a lot of compliments on this- matches my expensive headboard to a T, and looks amazing at such a low price. So glad my husband found this.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe this product was purchased on amazon for as little as it was. The quality is amazing, it is such a sturdy piece of furniture. Took me 2 minutes to assemble by myself, and it’s the perfect size for our king bed. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Baczewski

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect....
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I would change is a little more reinforcement for less wobble and legs without rollers. It slides each time I sit down because we have tile. Otherwise I love it, it’s beautiful at the end of our bed. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my front formal living room, buying another for my back family room!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality and beauty of this piece for the price! It is a lovely linen color and I would definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Came with damage
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the bench came with the bottom ripped. The rest of the bench is great and it looks pretty, but I’m going to have to try and restaple or sew the bottom back together because it hangs down underneath. I’m disappointed for the money I paid for it to come torn apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench! Super easy to assemble (just the legs needed to be added), and it’s beautiful at the end of our bed. Very sturdy to sit on. Doesn’t roll out from under us, haha.
customer_reviews.author: Tin Man

customer_reviews.title: Really Beautiful Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ottoman for my family room and I love it. I'm using it as an ottoman/coffe table in front of a sofa. Was concerned at first that it might not work, but it's a beatiful addition to my room. Very easy to put together and sturdy. The price is awesome on Amazon. I've seen this same exact piece for $200 more in a retail store. Don't hesitate to buy this. I ordered on a Sunday and it showed up at my front door on Tuesday via Prime service.
customer_reviews.author: Jill T.

customer_reviews.title: great looking bench
customer_reviews.text: initially mis-delivered; I received the wrong package that was not the bench ordered; but the error was quickly rectified, and the product ordered was received. We are very happy with the bench.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the creamy color
customer_reviews.text: Love the creamy color. Nice, firm and strong. Love the 6 legs rather than 4 and clever built in storage of legs. Easy to put together and perfect for even a queen bed. Easy to move. Ecstatic! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Love this bench!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench and just as described! Wrapped very well for shipping and easy to put together! Seems to be great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Charles M. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Substantial and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Love it..very substantial! My only issue is that the cushion part is very hard and not comfortable. I bought additional cushions and that does help. Overall, a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ADORE this bench! Looks amazing with my dining room table! I was afraid it wasn’t going to be high enough but it’s perfect! Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: CherylMK

customer_reviews.title: It’s says white, however it’s off-white
customer_reviews.text: This product is not white. It is off-white. I wanted white but don’t want the hassle of returning. Guess this will have to do.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Found exact item on competitors website (Way....) for 2x the price! Arrived on time, easy to assemble, great quality!
customer_reviews.author: kak1971

customer_reviews.title: pleased with quality and size
customer_reviews.text: love it! fits perfectly at the end of our bed
customer_reviews.author: kristie

customer_reviews.title: Classic and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Easy peasy to add elegant tough to our front entry
customer_reviews.author: Danise Klumb

customer_reviews.title: Luxe for Less - Beautiful and practical
customer_reviews.text: High end elegance. Beautiful. Linen colored with black legs/rollers. Just as depicted online. Looks high quality for an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Carefree Living

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Wider than I expected. Really classy looking. Not heavy, probably couldn't handle heavy usage, but a great bed end. Amazing price!
customer_reviews.author: kaperspec

customer_reviews.title: Sits a little lower than I want but overall it ...
customer_reviews.text: Sits a little lower than I want but overall it will do the job. A little darker than you expect from linen but is barely noticeable next to my chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hesitant with color saying white, read the reviews and no one said white! It’s a gorgeous creamy color like linen, love it with my king bed!! Good value for the size too!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Looks lovely at the foot of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Looks lovely at the foot of my CAL King bed and took the Hubby less than 15 minutes to put it together. Love the price and since I have Amazon Prime in arrived within 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Saeteunel

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bench but One leg came broken. No way to contact seller to ask for new piece.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Guilmette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bench is perfect. It is beautiful and just what I needed and expected
customer_reviews.author: ODAM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my living room! I have a big sectional and wanted something that wouldn’t take up too much space on a bare wall. This was perfect! It is a charcoal color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our closet.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality bench for the money. It was very easy to assemble. And, we are receiving compliments about how nice it looks. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas B Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Came defective
customer_reviews.text: The product was defected. The bench required you to screw in the six legs which was easy to do. Just one of the screws came broken therefore impossible to assemble. Item was returned.
customer_reviews.author: First time mommy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a king size bed!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my king size bed! I'm thrilled with the quality, size, and price of this bench.
customer_reviews.author: jenkc0011

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I searched several places for a bench to add to the elegance of my master bedroom. This bench fit it so well! Hubby loves it too :)
customer_reviews.author: Taheedah Davie

customer_reviews.title: Color is wrong
customer_reviews.text: That doesnt look white to me -_- That's cream. Disapointed in that because I needed it white.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, really good quality. Color is charcoal gray. Super easy to attach the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Robin R

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price for the quality.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, it was so easy to put together that my fiancé couldn't wait for me to get home from work that she put it together. Great quality and low price.
customer_reviews.author: Joey M. Jaraba Jr.

customer_reviews.title: ... is sold @Home for much more - very very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact same that is sold @Home for much more - very very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kimellen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bench is very nice. Material is good. Legs are not as strong as I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Frances cahalane

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks fabulous in our bedroom! We have a king size bed and it's the perfect length. Great price and great quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Assembly is very easy and does not require ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Assembly is very easy and does not require tools. The color is slightly darker off white than pictured but it is a nice color.
customer_reviews.author: NCMC

customer_reviews.title: We love it. When I read the reviews that said ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it. When I read the reviews that said it was slightly darker than in the picture I was actually glad, I prefer the actual color. It is more beige than ivory. We have a king size bed and it fits perfectly at the foot of the bed. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing and super sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: My hubby is a big guy so I was as a little nervous about this bench-- as I could not find any info on its weight rating prior to my purchase. I am so glad I did! FYI...it holds up to 275lbs. I ordered the 62" inch bench in gray. It looks great at the foot of our california king bed. It is very sturdy, quality (expensive looking with out the price tag), and the fabric holds up to our three pooches and two kid who use it to boost onto the bed. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: gonzoa

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product, good quality, colored matched my ottoman (which I'm using as a center piece). I'm using this bench with my dinning table.

product_meta.title: Linon Isabelle Bed Bench, 62-Inch, Black Finish
product_meta.description: Color:Gray/BlackEvoking elegance; the Isabelle Bench is has a timeless design that will easily complement traditional and transitional homes. Upholstered in a Charcoal Linen fabric; the bench is accented with designer details such as silver nail heads.
